West_Allis.First Unitarian Church (Milwaukee, Wisco:
The First Unitarian Church is a historic Gothic Revival-styled church built in 1891-92 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1974.
First Unitarian's congregation hired the firm of Ferry & Clas of Milwaukee to design their new church building, and Ferry himself led the design - in reserved Gothic Revival style.
